spanGrp.span: I do not know how Ajarians make weddings in our village.
nu näblem bizım kövdä dügün edändän bu ajarlarda bän bülmirım
When the wedding happens in the village – first the girls wedding take part, but they do not do it so.
bunnarın elä yohtur bizı kövdä dügün edändän birınji ğız dügüni olir
They call it xx and if somebody wants to go there.
baba äkmägi diirlär kim istier o baba äkmägınä gidir
Then the boy’s wedding takes part.
When there is wedding happening it’s important to take a bride from her father’s house or from the house of god parents.
dügün olanda bizım ahnayah gälıni gidirlär čığartmaya ya gälıni baba ävındän čıığarderlär yada čığardirlär šeidän mm kirvasi gildän
Before the wedding they visit their godparent’s and take him ram and presents.
dügün bašlamadan kirvaya tohlinan gidirlär älägınän padarok götürirlär
The nation that came they don’t have these traditions, they go straight to the wedding.
bu gälän millättä elä yohtur srazu halh dügünä gidir i vsyo
Then they go to take our bride out.
During this they are dressing the bride, they sing a song, if they know songs.
gälıni geindırändän türki čağırerlär bizım diljä kimki bülir
They sing a song, they are dressing the bride and then mother and father rise her hand by hand.
türki čağırirlär gälıni geindırirlär sora gälıni iläri čäkirlär sora ğalhir ana babasi alälä verirlär
We have not seen such things at Ajarians.
bu ajarlarda biz elä iš görmämišıh
Then we go to the restaurant and they also take the bride to the house and at the entrance they put a plate.
sorada uže gidersın obšipita i gälıni sora ävä gätırirlär ešiga tabah ğoirlär
The bride hits the plate with her shoe and breaks it and after that they throw candies.
gälın tabaği vurir ğırir gıčiinan an sora kamfet säpirlär üstünä
